title: I Learned 7 things in 7 days (to impress my son)

comments.comment: I never expected this channel to end up as something so wholesome. Now I’m older this is exactly what I love seeing. So calm and heartwarming.
I often catch myself smiling at the dad vlogs. I'm just happy to see Felix, Marzia, Björn, Edgar and Momo being a happy little family of five. So sweet. We're all very proud of the two of you.

Swedish-native speaking man, interpreting a Japanese cook book to his mostly English speaking audience IN English, while being spot checked by his Italian-native speaking wife, is next life type of entertainment and I love this wholesome content
Seeing how ripped PewDiePie was made me realize how far he’s come. It’s really inspiring tbh.

Felix: I need to spin frisbee on my finger to impress my son
Also Felix: casually flips knife around with ease
felix wanting to learn how to spin a frisbee because he wants to impress bjorn like when he was a kid is the most wholesome thing ive heard all day

Pewds is just doing side quests at this point.
Keep going, i love it.
Front flips are still super cool at 32 years old!
How times have changed. This whole channel in 20 years is something great to look upon. Congrats Felix you deserve it
Felix's caring nature for family warms my heart, hes like number one dream daddy
That wizard hat bought tears to my eyes, Bjorn is so lucky to have such wonderful parents

- How times have changed. 
- This whole channel in 20 years is something great to look upon. 
- Congrats Felix you deserve it.
Felix's father must be so happy that his son remembered something like his father spinning a frisbee on his hand, i hope his heart is full after seeing how Felix talked about that memory <3
I'm practically sobbing at how cute this video is!!! Björn might not remember these things now but I'm sure he'll love seeing this video in the future!
From a young average youtuber to a responsible father...... PewDiePie has come a long way....
as kids we always assumed our parents knew everything. poods is living up to that legacy
The world NEEDS this type of content pewds right now... You ARE the hero we need.
You've impressed me. I am now your son.
This channel is a time capsule. It’s so amazing watching someone grow and change throughout the years! We’re so proud of you Pewds!
the shadow puppets part touched my heart so deeply i almost cried.. been here since amnesia, time did go by, thank you felix for making me happy. i wish your lovely family the best.
Proof that these two will be amazing parents and that little boy is incredibly lucky to have them
Seeing Bjorn watch Felix do the shadow puppets made my eyes well up. So pure. Pewds is the father we all wish we had
my man did the reverse dadbod and found happiness in japan with his wife and kid. I could not be more proud of the guy that entertained me as a kid.
Isn’t it lovely that Bjorn can look back on his father in this way

Pewds: "Are you impressed, my boy?"

Björn: "The council of Björn has spoken."
Marzia taking the opportunity to trick her husband into cooking is hilarious

bro got me smiling by making silly shadows, felt like a baby
super nice and wholesome video pewds, made me truly happy
I'm going to be a dad in few months and this kind of content is exactly what I want to watch rn. Ty Pewds
This is so wholesome and cute. We've come a long way, guys. Seeing Felix do these little things for his kid makes me  so happy for them.
Some of my favorite pewdiepie content is just watching him have hobbies and try new things. It’s so endearing
Pewds is slowly becoming a stereotypical dad and im loving it

sewing enthusiast here, you sew things insides out so you can inverse it after sewing and you get nice seams where you dont see the thread, pretty sure you could do that with Bjorn's lil wizard hat still
this is the most felix video ever. it's got philosophy, it's got dumbells, the dogs, marzia and bjorn... all in all, lovely to see him in this light!
This man has officially completed all the main quests in life and is now going for the side quests. Legend
Hey Felix, I'm 33 yo and the sadness has been really intense the past couple of months. Seeing you make these videos gives me 20mins of happiness, thank you.

4:10 AGREED.

I recently picked up riding a motorcycle, and I noticed that practicing for 6 hours felt like slowing progress than practicing for 2 hours and going to bed. I'd wake up and my shifts would be smoother, my hill starts would be better, my procedures would be more in-tune. Rest wins.

Might just have to permanently sleep.
Bjorn is such a lucky kid, he's going to have a blast growing up with these 2 parents!
As someone who's been watching since 2010, I can confidently say that the new Papa Pewds Era is by far my favorite. So happy for you guys.
I’m glad you’re having so much fun being a father. It’s a great experience enjoy him while he’s still small
The hand puppies with bjorn responses is the most wholesome, sweetest thing 🥹️
The evolution of Felix from goofy gamer kid to wholesome intellectual father can be appreciated on this one channel, and it is amazing!
The shadow puppets segment was extremely wholesome. Seeing Felix totally let go and act a fool for his son was awesome
I love how Björn is just chilling in the background as Felix is making shadow puppets to him, it's such a parent thing to do and it is so CUTE.
I'm loving the dad content! I just became a dad myself last year, incidentally also to a Scandinavian-Italian boy, and seeing these videos really warms my heart
This is so freaking sweet, I was smiling throughout the whole video. It's so heartwarming to see you having so much fun being Björn's dad. He's so lucky to have you, Felix <3
I dont think his son is old enough to be impressed but i like how hes doing what his dad did when he was a kid to his son , its like tradition

I just got off a 12 hr night shift at the hospital exhausted and now I’m crying while watching a YouTuber I’ve followed since I was in middle school. Live moves so fast… one minute I was a little girl and now I’m a grown woman working and living on my own in the city. And I feel like as much as I’ve grown, Felix and Marzia have too. It gives me so much perspective. Life will move on and so will the hard moments. We continue to live to see beautiful moment like these

Just getting out of a toxic relationship after a year of being with someone who love bombed me in the beginning, threatened me into saying yes to him proposing, threatened to get me pregnant, never goes out with or hangs out with me and guilt trips me everyday for wanting more. Watching Pewds, his wife and his baby so happy showed me what I want in life. I don’t want marriage and a baby. I want marriage and a baby with somebody who understands me. I know I’m trauma dumping, I just wanted to say I really appreciate this content. It’s healing to see happy relationships. I thought I would be jealous and on some level I want what they have but mostly, I feel happy for them and hopeful for myself :,)
In this video we learned how much Felix improved his physique, his Japanese, and that he's capable of math. I'm so proud.

I'm so happy for Bjorn, I love this video. As a psychologist, all of this colorful, eye-catching activities are stimulating his brain from such a young age, this is perfect! He's going to be really smart  I'm so happy to see such a present, full of love fatherhood and motherhood, he's so lucky ️
Petition to make a series where Björn gives Felix challenges on multiple things to earn his approval

I haven’t been able to watch any videos in months, just super busy with life. I’m so happy the family videos are here still so i can watch them. It feels so special the moments you share with us. You and Marzia make me laugh. Being a mom and having a family, relating to you on a another level through all the silly little moments is so crazy special. I really miss Marzia YouTube channel and all her videos but its nice that shes around to add her touch to your videos.
Seeing Felix being sooo happy to be a dad is so wholesome.

I'm absolutely living for pewdies daddy arc lol I've been watching him at least 10 years and its almost felt like I'm growing up along side him from a young adult up to here. Now I'm in my late 20s and pregnant with my first and its so fun watching these experiences
I am so glad that I was born in an era that I can witness the journey of Pewdiepie.
I still can't believe Pewds is a freaking dad! I'm happy for him and Marzia starting this milestone of their life
Felix is jacked as hell lol 3:30

I don’t know if this is weird but ever since I was born I never had a dad and seeing you do this stuff for your kid helps me know what I should be doing for my future kid so thank you for being a type of mentor/ father figure :)
Ngl seeing these wholesome videos makes me want to work on myself and be a better version of myself. Ik it sounds stupid but thank you Felix for still making us laugh even to this day
I cried watching this cause it’s the most wholesome video I watched I a long time. It’s so genuine and heartwarming. Hope for you guys the best️

father pewds is so wholesome

i felt like i was the kid the whole time i was just smiling and snorting like a dumbass watching his shadow puppetry lmao
What a cool dad. Marzia is naturally talented, and Bjorn is naturally cute.
I know it's not healthy to idealize someone but man... Its hard not to with such a beautiful family as this one, I just hope this family keeps the happiness many of us can't get.
Felix with his kid is the most wholesome, lovely thing I've ever seen!

Felix is really turning into an amazing dad. I didnt have the greatest dad growing up so this really warms my heart and im so happy that bjorn gets to grow up with such an amazing father. Much love pewds youre the father i strive to be like some day!
18:06 okay, if i was a kid. I kinda find it kinda scary seeing a human head hanging above my bed
Your son is going to look back on these videos in the future and it will be a very emotional moment for him.
i love how your content somehow became even more wholesome. your videos feel like a break from reality, thank you
Bjorn's surely gonna enjoy his dad's unhinged personality lol. This is so wholesome!!
At this time in our universe it has felt like many things have reached their "bad ending", but I can say without a doubt that we got the good ending of the PewDiePie timeline
Its so incredibly cute when pewds smiles at björn and björn smiles back. It warms my heart

It's 1 AM currently and I just watched the video, after playing with my own baby until almost 11 PM after work I sat at my computer and fell asleep on the chair, I woke up with my head falling towards my keyboard. 2 hours later I am smiling, almost crying from happiness just watching this video... Every single time I get the time to watch your videos I'm filled with happiness! Bjorn will be proud of his father!
I like how Felix made a video about his son being born and that he won't be as active anymore because of that but here he is with near weekly videos.
2:54 advise can be applied somewhere else
Man, you’ve definitely turned into one of the best YouTubers out there. Congrats

This video gave me more motivation to start working out than anything or anyone else ever has. I'm beginning tomorrow since today I have a school assignment to finish, but I just want to say: Thank you, Pewds. You've forbye inspired me to remember my childhood and try to emulate the things I thought were cool, like learning new words. (P.s. "forbye" means "In addition to; besides", so basically a fancy synonym for "also")


I also want to mention that it's so cool seeing how much you've grown since I started watching your videos twelve years ago. I hope you are proud of how far you've come and where you are now and I wish nothing but the best to Björn, Marzia and you!!
Bjorn is gonna have a ton of core memories about a bright orange frisbee and not understand why. He'll just know he loves them

Damn pewds I have a 3 year old daughter imma do this for her. Thank you for another great idea. You’re constantly teaching me something or showing me how to grow as a human. Thank you Felix, from the bottom of my heart.
Learning things as an older human takes a lot of mindfulness. It's great to see pweds put aside his pride and embrace the pride in the humility of admitting there's always room to learn.
It’s great to see men being responsible dads and great role models for their kids. Bjorn will see these videos and appreciate his dad so much when he is older
I love seeing you embrace the dad life, so beautiful we get to see it Felix bless you all ️

So cute to see how much fun he had, especially with the shadow puppets, doing voices and being silly. I don’t think he would be willing to get silly like that when he was younger. So heart warming to see him try to better himself learning new things and having fun!

Some kids are born under a lucky star man, Bjorn is certainly one of them! Imagine hitting the soul jackpot when you got to become Felix and Marzia's kid, holy shit :D What a heritage he will have and also something to live up to too, perhaps!

To watch you from my teenager years till now having a baby a month after is a treat. We just had a baby daughter and to watch you transfer into father hood like me is just mind boggling. I hope everything is well can’t wait for more videos like this

This is honestly so wholesome and sweet, im not afraid to admit i started tearing up at the shadow puppets. Learning skills for your son when he grows is so incredibly selfless. As a ftm to a 1 and change year old, can confirm it wont be too long before you can put those skills to use
Pewds is a legend. Honestly this kid is going to grow up with two great parents and im happy that marzia and Felix have two worlds revolving around them
I just realized Bjorn will probably be able to speak Swedish, Japanese, English, and Italian. that's insane
growing up watching you play happy wheels and amnesia, pewds doing the same humor with bjorn melts my heart, so wholesome!
It's so cute that he's learning "Dad" tricks. Reminds me of my father being a goofball when I was a child 🥹️ Felix is a great dad!!
Björn calling Felix father and Marzia mother instead of dad and mom is somehow so dramatically funny laughed out loud when Felix read his cooking challenge letter
14:15 wow that Momo one was S+
Felix keeps reminding me with these videos what my real dream is and who I aspire to be. Thank you so much for bringing so much light in pretty dark times.

I am a first time father of a 9 month old, it's awesome that we had kids not to far apart from each other. I am excited to learn from your journey as well :) Cheers Felix. You're already making out to be a great dad.

I remember for college projects, if you’re working on it for a couple hours, progress gets slow, you get stuck. Go on a walk, take a nap, sleep and try again tomorrow. Half the time I’d figure it out in 5 minutes once I started again

His YouTube content has changed and it's so much better now... Vlogs with the baby and his family life instead of pointless videos just for millions of views... I love this new version of his channel, he surely went a long way! :)
24:23 it's so cute how little Björn looks at felix

I sincerely thought your skills had multiplied in the span of a few seconds when Momo suddenly appeared  even my kids who are 9 and 6 enjoyed watching you do that! So happy to see you and Marzia tackling parenthood so well! Happy wishes for you both.
When a man become a father, he will discover the true meaning of happiness, especially when you see your kid smile..so proud of you...best dad..
one word strikes fear in felix’s eyes: bridge. it makes him remember, that incident damaged him greatly
